main event: A witness observed a bright orange saucer-like object in the sky over Bridgeton, New Jersey on March 29, 1966.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 4 minutes,The witness reported the object fading away,The object was seen during the night sky conditions,The report mentions a police sergeant witnessing the object as well,The radio in the police car cut out when the object was in view, but resumed working after it disappeared.
